sentences.en: By this means it was possible to recapitulate the life cycle of a carrote plant.
sentences.cn: 这个方法能重演胡罗卜的生活史.

sentences.en: Here to recapitulate is a detailed list of the program characteristics.
sentences.cn: 这里概括了程序特征的详细列表.

sentences.en: I will now briefly recapitulate the foregoing cases.
sentences.cn: 我现在将上述各项事实,扼要地重述一遍.

sentences.en: It will be helpful to recapitulate them.
sentences.cn: 在这里将其简要重述一下也是有帮助的.

sentences.en: It will shortly be put up for sale under the terms already communicated to you, which, to recapitulate , call for a very minimum of publicity.
sentences.cn: 不久它就可以上市，按照我们与你商定的条款进行销售，重申一遍，这些条款尽量不要对外公开。

sentences.en: Let's just recapitulate the essential points.
sentences.cn: 我们再来回顾一下要点。
让我们来概括一下要点.

sentences.en: Recapitulate from last time: What does it mean to study Creole Languages and Caribbean Identities?
sentences.cn: 上节课的概括: 研究克理奥尔语言和加勒比海身分认同的意义为何?

sentences.en: So much for the detailed argument, I will now recapitulate.
sentences.cn: 详细理由业已说完, 我现在简述要旨.

sentences.en: Try to avoid the too frequent use of such Latin words as juxtaposition, animadvert, salutation, recapitulate.
sentences.cn: 尽量不要经常使用这些拉丁词语,比如juxtaposition, animadvert, salutation, recapitulate.

sentences.en: While the most damage and destroy is attribute to the vehicles load recapitulate impaction.
sentences.cn: 而桥梁的大部分损伤和疲劳破坏是车辆荷载长期反复作用的结果.

sentences.en: Would life recapitulate any of its familiar stages, or would It'stun us with contrary alternatives?
sentences.cn: 生命将重现那些我们熟悉的阶段, 还是以与我们预料的相反的选择让我们大吃一惊?

trans.tran_en: to repeat the main points of something that has just been said
